introduction.para: The parameter properties pane allows editing of parameter attributes including name, expression, units and annotations. Fields in brown cannot be edited. Note:

list.item: Description cannot be changed for any type of parameter.
For 'Reaction' parameters that are not user-defined, only Name and Expression of parameter can be changed.
For 'Application' parameters, only their Expression can be changed.

operations.para: Edit the Parameter Name in the field. If a name already exists, an error dialog is shown, and the name is rejected.
